body.p: Bourbon County, Kentucky, attorney. Married Tinnie C. Brown. Father of Fannie Brown. Attorney in North Middletown, Kentucky, in 1860. Appointed Clerk of the Council of the Provisional Confederate Government of Kentucky on November 18, 1861.
